mapper.sql: ID, RUN_SPEED, WALK_SPEED, CROUCH_SPEED, ACCEL_SPEED, JUMP_SPEED, THROW_SPEED, RESOURCE_P, IS_DEFAULT, IS_DELETED, COST, NAME, MAX_HP, EX_HP, LEVEL, IS_FIRED, RESOURCE_NAME, IS_ENABLE, CONTROLLER_HEIGHT, CONTROLLER_RADIUS, CONTROLLER_CROUCH_HEIGHT, SCORE_OFFSET
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_CHARACTER where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_CHARACTER (ID, RUN_SPEED, WALK_SPEED, CROUCH_SPEED, ACCEL_SPEED, JUMP_SPEED, THROW_SPEED, RESOURCE_P, IS_DEFAULT, IS_DELETED, COST, NAME, MAX_HP, EX_HP, LEVEL, IS_FIRED, RESOURCE_NAME, IS_ENABLE, CONTROLLER_HEIGHT, CONTROLLER_RADIUS, CONTROLLER_CROUCH_HEIGHT, SCORE_OFFSET) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{runSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{walkSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{crouchSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{accelSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{jumpSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{throwSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{resourceP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxHp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exHp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isFired,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{controllerHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{controllerRadius,jdbcType=REAL}, #{controllerCrouchHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{scoreOffset,jdbcType=INTEGER})

replace into SYS_CHARACTER (ID, RUN_SPEED, WALK_SPEED, CROUCH_SPEED, ACCEL_SPEED, JUMP_SPEED, THROW_SPEED, RESOURCE_P, IS_DEFAULT, IS_DELETED, COST, NAME, MAX_HP, EX_HP, LEVEL, IS_FIRED, RESOURCE_NAME, IS_ENABLE, CONTROLLER_HEIGHT, CONTROLLER_RADIUS, CONTROLLER_CROUCH_HEIGHT, SCORE_OFFSET) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.runSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.walkSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.crouchSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.accelSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.jumpSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.throwSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.resourceP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maxHp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.exHp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isFired,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.controllerHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.controllerRadius,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.controllerCrouchHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.scoreOffset,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update SYS_CHARACTER
RUN_SPEED = #{runSpeed,jdbcType=REAL},
WALK_SPEED = #{walkSpeed,jdbcType=REAL},
CROUCH_SPEED = #{crouchSpeed,jdbcType=REAL},
ACCEL_SPEED = #{accelSpeed,jdbcType=REAL},
JUMP_SPEED = #{jumpSpeed,jdbcType=REAL},
THROW_SPEED = #{throwSpeed,jdbcType=REAL},
RESOURCE_P = #{resourceP,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAX_HP = #{maxHp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EX_HP = #{exHp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_FIRED = #{isFired,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ENABLE = #{isEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTROLLER_HEIGHT = #{controllerHeight,jdbcType=REAL},
CONTROLLER_RADIUS = #{controllerRadius,jdbcType=REAL},
CONTROLLER_CROUCH_HEIGHT = #{controllerCrouchHeight,jdbcType=REAL},
SCORE_OFFSET = #{scoreOffset,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_CHARACTER set RUN_SPEED = #{runSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, WALK_SPEED = #{walkSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, CROUCH_SPEED = #{crouchSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, ACCEL_SPEED = #{accelSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, JUMP_SPEED = #{jumpSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, THROW_SPEED = #{throwSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, RESOURCE_P = #{resourceP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAX_HP = #{maxHp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EX_HP = #{exHp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_FIRED = #{isFired,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ENABLE = #{isEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTROLLER_HEIGHT = #{controllerHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, CONTROLLER_RADIUS = #{controllerRadius,jdbcType=REAL}, CONTROLLER_CROUCH_HEIGHT = #{controllerCrouchHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, SCORE_OFFSET = #{scoreOffset,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
